website_summaries.verdict: For the true Rosie the Riveter – a women’s work boot that means business.
pros: Light safety composite (not metal) toe means this tough work boot is also lightweight for all-day wear – and doesn’t set off metal detectors
Waterproof leather keeps feet dry and comfortable
Great traction, and can go from work to the trail
Plenty of room for custom orthotics
Pink laces are a nice touch
cons: They can stretch out and feel loose after time

customer_reviews.title: Surpasses the Competition in Comfort & Durability!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I loooove these boots. This is my 2nd pair. Bought the 1st ones on a whim in 2015 after my Tiberland Pro's gave out. This boot lasted waaaaay longer than the Tims. Much more durable too. Lots of space in the toe box, good with a reg athletic sock, but can also accommodate a thicker sock in the winter. I swapped out the insole with a Sofsole memory foam. And it is heavenly. I can stand for 10hrs with no problems. I may never wear another over hyped, low performance Tim again!
customer_reviews.author: S. Nicole

customer_reviews.title: they looked really nice but, the padding on the insole was too ...
customer_reviews.text: I had worn these boots around the house for about a week trying to test them out. First, they looked really nice but, the padding on the insole was too hard and the boot itself was somewhat too big for me. I did like that these boots are high though. They offer very good support to the ankles and foot. If you don't have foot problems like me, these will probably be great for you. I needed a boot w/ very good padding on the insole.
customer_reviews.author: FieryFury

customer_reviews.title: Ordered Wide, Fit Narrow.
customer_reviews.text: These boots were a complete waste of time. Needed a wide, ordered wide, even ordered a half size up to ensure fit with a thicker sock. These came soooo narrow, didn't even try to push foot in. Felt like Cinderella's ugly step sister trying to put her foot in the glass slipper. And I am not a big woman. 5'8" 135 pounds. Immediately put back in box and proceeded to start return. Shame Timberland!
customer_reviews.author: M. Cox

customer_reviews.title: I just love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: I work construction site security and do my rounds on foot on various terrains. I measured my foot length and used size chart before ordering. Fit is good. I've broken two toes on my right foot and they cause problems with shoe fit but these boots don't hurt at all. I have plantar fasciitis and, although the insoles of the boots are great, I still put my periodic insoles on top of them. It's like walking on a cloud! No heel or arch pain and the height of the boot top keeps my ankles in line. No leaks, even when walking through thigh deep wet grass after a rain. I couldn't be happier with the weight, either.
customer_reviews.author: Lannie

customer_reviews.title: The
customer_reviews.text: Over all they are pretty good the only complaint I have is on the left front where the steel toe shield is rubs the top of my foot. I have to put a bunion sticker on the top of my foot but it didn’t help much. Also I’ve had these a few months and had to buy inserts my feet started hurting so bad. I do work 45 hours a week walking on concrete so maybe these boots aren’t made for that!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality but overall too wide/large for me
customer_reviews.text: I have owned Wolverines in the past and expected these to fit a bit large overall. I was correct. Fortunately, I can use my own insoles to try to keep them adequately snug. I wear them working as a loader in a beverage production/distribution plant. They have good slip resistance and a decent comp toe. I just wish Wolverine would start manufacturing shoes for women with narrow feet, or offer a narrow size. Lots of women work in warehouses and/or manufacturing and they don't all have wide feet!
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: This boot was comfortable for the first month and half by month TWO ...
customer_reviews.text: This boot was comfortable for the first month and half by month TWO this boot totally shredded apart in the heel box inside giving me huge blisters. I wrote to Wolverine but never heard a response. The leather on toe box scuffed up as if they were being cut by a sharp object. I work inside a grocery store! Terrible boot . I don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie S.

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the merlin
customer_reviews.text: I'd give it 5 stars, except for two things. The back makes it annoying to wrestle on to my foot, and wolverine makes a different boot, the merlin, that is almost identical except that it has a dip in the back that fixes the wrestle-it-on problem. Buy that one instead!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: started falling apart after just a few wears
customer_reviews.text: bought these boots for work - did a ton of research to find what I'd hoped to be the perfect boot. After just a couple of wears they loosened up quite a bit. But worse, was that the rubber bottom started to come apart and peel!! I've only worn them for 4 shifts. Totally unacceptable. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Light duty boot
customer_reviews.text: Nice boot for light industrial work. Thinner leather. I returned them because I needed a heavier duty protection on my entire foot, thicker leather that would hold up if something sharp and heavy impacted my boot.
customer_reviews.author: graveshift

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boot. Will only buy wolverine from here out. I wear them while clearing property. I walk approx 10-12 miles ever weekend in them. I bought half size bigger and put insole in them but they don’t need it.
customer_reviews.author: C LeGrand

customer_reviews.title: they are now pretty comfy. I do wish they didn't have a ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots were very uncomfortable until I added in an arch support insole. The boot is a bit deep, and so the boot was biting into my ankles, but with the arch support, they are now pretty comfy. I do wish they didn't have a pink interior... I'm pretty sure I'd know it was a women's boot even without that and the pink-laden laces. Overall it's been a good boot so far though.
customer_reviews.author: Sara_1213

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I needed either a steel toe or composite toe shoe for my job with a battery manufacturer. My feet didn’t hurt but my ankles were so sore and swollen by the end of the week that I had to go out and buy a different pair of shoes. I still have the shoes in my locker at work since I figured I can try and wear them for bad weather but I was definitely disappointed especially after reading the reviews. I do like the fact that there are slip resistant though.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: ONE STAR FOR COMFORT!  don't know how to edit stars..
customer_reviews.text: Fell APART,, Wide enough that I didn't have to go up a size, beautiful to look at, feel awesome, and I can dig in our horrible rocky soil without hurting my feet on the shovell UPDATE!! Sole basically fell off of this boot after only TWO months!! I will return but feel so disappointed because they are very comfortable don't know how to change star rating
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Solid pair of work boots
customer_reviews.text: My co-worker bought these same boots and raves about them. Had to borrow her pair for a quick project after I had gotten rid of an old pair of work boots for the season. Liked them so much I bought a pair for myself. Fits well, roomy enough for good wool socks. They keep my feet warm and dry. Great work boots, 5/5 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good boots
customer_reviews.text: These were honestly great boots. The insoles wore out in about a year, but the boots lasted 2 years and were fine with added insoles. They were extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Talbert

customer_reviews.text: NOT COMFORTABLE AT ALL! I work as an industrial cleaner in a power plant, I'm on my feet 10 hrs daily and all I can say for these boots is OUCH! By the way I'm 5'2 130lbs. so these boots should have held up better for comfort!!! Sorry, only telling it true.
customer_reviews.author: jill escobar

customer_reviews.title: Good long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find a great boot for women. I thought id just try these. The ankle support was great and the soles are thick. And comfortable for a 12 hour day. The composite toe is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very comfortable, even with the steel plate I had to put in because my wook boots have to be puncture resistant, and have not found any of that sort in women's sizes. the only problem is the fact that they lace all the way to the top. If I had taken a closer look I would not have bought them, because in order to take them on or off you have to completely unlace them. I like boots that have the hooks lined up at the top so all you have yo do is losen them and put on or remove. But they are comfortable and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy L. Stotts

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: The boyfriend got the for me as he wears the men's version all winter. These are amazing boots end worth every penny! I have weak ankles and these provide phenomenal support! The toe area is wider than I expected but not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Other than that pretty good shoe for relief work as a volunteer
customer_reviews.text: ankles were sore from wearing these for 3 weeks. Other than that pretty good shoe for relief work as a volunteer. Can't beat the price either. I added puncture proof soles for added safety. All good in super hot Caribbean temps (8hrs daily)
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Probably the most comfortable boot I have owned
customer_reviews.text: Probably the most comfortable boot I have owned , I think the only complaint is they are hard to pull on but once on they are comfortable. I am an electrician and on my feet all day plus they are very light weight and that makes a huge difference when you tend to walk over 5 miles a day at your job.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie D

customer_reviews.title: Best boots ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best boots I have ever purchased! I’m using them for heavy duty work in the garden and they’re perfect and very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots, they lasted me almost 2 years on my last pair so I got another pair. Great ankle support and they look good as well as feel good. My feet are happy.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: sole separation around toe area.
customer_reviews.text: These were great in the beginning and required no break in period. I was greatly disappointed when the front of the boots started to separate from the toe area. It’s on both boots. I work in a warehouse loading trucks so wouldn’t think this would happen due to excessive use... I would would love to exchange them- because maybe my pair was defective... but there doesn’t seem to be a way to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Nice lightweight boot.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to wear when I ride my motorcycle. Still breaking them in and am liking them so far. My feet stay warm (we've been riding in 40 degree weather) with just one good pair of socks. They are comfortable and light weight. They feel a bit narrow in the toes but I'm thinking that since they are leather uppers they'll stretch a little as I break them in.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Marchitelli

customer_reviews.title: Love them. Feminine work boots.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and feel. They are light weight and sturdy at the same time. I have broken them in a few hours at a time, but that is my routine for new boots. Wore them in the rain the past couple of days and not a drop of water made it into the boots.
customer_reviews.author: R. Max

customer_reviews.title: The only boots we buy
customer_reviews.text: What can I say we are a wolverine family all the way. I am a dog groomer and these work great keeping my feet dry and comfortable all day. My husband gets a new pair of wolverines about every 6 months. They last and are wonderful work boots we wouldnt buy anything else
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, with minor flaws..
customer_reviews.text: They are great for the work I do in construction, yet they arrived in a damaged box and already have scuffed marks on the front toe area. They are a little heavier than my others and I have to get used to that. Otherwise they are comfortable and a perfect boots for women to work in all day.
customer_reviews.author: HYLittlefeet

customer_reviews.title: They look like they have been used already!!!
customer_reviews.text: So I get the package which is beat to hell and back, only to open it and find the soles out of the boots, a STAIN on one of the boots, and a cigarette inside the box?!?!?! What in the hell went down with this box? For $100 this is ridiculous!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: J Davis

customer_reviews.title: They are fantastic now and I gravitate toward them for more things ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots fit exactly the way I needed them to, the only issue I had was the first week or so having the balls of my feet pinched, obviously with any work boot they will have to be broken in. They are fantastic now and I gravitate toward them for more things than work now. I sometimes need to stand in water, walk through snow, or even trudge through mud/gravel/corn fields. Easy to clean, and I've never had wet feet either. Just clean them & put some leather protector on- they're good to go! I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Teal

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: The life span of these boots was a joke. Only lasted a few months. They were uncomfortable, cheap, and and issues with smell I never had with any of my other boots. Going back to timberland.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too tight. Odd fit at the top.
customer_reviews.text: Fit was too small and tight for my foot, even without thick socks. The top was tight at a weird part of my ankle/leg. It made taking steps feel weird as some part of the boot was rubbing some part of my leg or ankle.
customer_reviews.author: JHill

customer_reviews.title: Buy Timberlands.
customer_reviews.text: These boots lasted less than a month. The sole is already coming off both shoes, and water leaks in. They were comfortable while they lasted, but I do highway construction with a heavy emphasis on environmental and erosion control, and these are basically useless to me now. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Liz C.

customer_reviews.title: Narrow toe
customer_reviews.text: I've worn reinforced toe boots for 12 years. Usually there is ample toe room despite the reinforcement. These get somewhat narrower at the toe, maybe for style reasons? Anyway, I'm keeping them, but I'm not really happy about it.
customer_reviews.author: Marybeth Hillard

customer_reviews.title: My boots arrived on time and fits as expected. ...
customer_reviews.text: My boots arrived on time and fits as expected. There is only a minor break-in period (near my left ankle) that is required for them to feel just right. Overall, no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Kimmy

customer_reviews.title: Pricey for quality
customer_reviews.text: Positive: they are lighter then expected for composite toe boots, and are waterproof. Negative: boots scuff easily and when scuffed the marks are white, also they dont offer any arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not slip resistant on treated concrete
customer_reviews.text: While the outside of the boot has held up decently, the interior has fallen apart (at the heel and toe), though after a while of consistent wear. I have yet to find a work boot that is slip resistant on treated concrete 😕
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: These boots are the best $100 I ever spent
customer_reviews.text: These boots are the best $100 I ever spent. I wanted them for winter boots, and they do not disappoint. Comfortable and water proof, they were exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: S. Nealon

customer_reviews.title: ok, maybe, if you break them in for a long time, which I didn't
customer_reviews.text: These felt clunky but better than other similar ones. I ended up returning them because I could not see myself being comfortable at work in these. I don't think I could wear them for longer than an hour or two before needing to rub my feet and I have traditional work boots that I wear for 10-14 hours straight with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis & Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Best Value-Meets safety guidles
customer_reviews.text: Very, very good boots for my industry. They met every safety requirement my company has as far as heel height, plenty of islets, carbon toe, and uppers. Black leather. However, they could be more comfy. I bought an insert and it helped a little.
customer_reviews.author: Vulk

customer_reviews.title: Run big
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the other reviews about the sizing. I wear an 8.5 in every shoe and these are too big. They are managable. I bought them for working in the yard...cutting grass, digging, planting, you name it. Got tired of my feet getting sweaty and wet from wearing old running shoes. Now my feet stay dry.....yay! The arch support is not really there, but that might be due to the shoe being too big. I think if I went down a size I would love them!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Item is advertised as a safety toe boot, when ...
customer_reviews.text: Item is advertised as a safety toe boot, when I received the boots the box indicates Composite toe boot. The boots inside the box are NOT safety toe. Wolverine is putting the wrong product in the box and over charging for the item! The non safety toe boots are around $20,00 less than the composite toe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They seem to be durable and they are comfortable. The composite toe makes them so much lighter ...
customer_reviews.text: They seem to be durable and they are comfortable. The composite toe makes them so much lighter than my old boots and hopefully me feet won't get as cold.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Stewart

customer_reviews.title: This boot is awesome, I by them all the time this is ...
customer_reviews.text: This boot is awesome,I by them all the time this is probably my 6th pair
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Camp

customer_reviews.title: Wolverine boots are great safety boots for industrial environments as well as comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Got for my wife a replacement for what she had before. Wolverine boots are great safety boots for industrial environments as well as comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: ppdjs725

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a great workboot!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots!! Work in a warehouse and didn't want steel toe boots, too heavy! These are just right for the job, very durable, needed polish able leather and have protected my feet from heavy boxes and are extremely comfortable!!
customer_reviews.author: christy

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite work shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Wore them for a 12hr shift straight out of the box.. Fit perfect. No pain at all. Definitely my new favorite work shoe!! Even roomy enough for thicker socks this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great. Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We're building a house so I needed some construction boots. These are great. Comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Maria M. O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, sole is durable enough to handle kicking shovels ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, sole is durable enough to handle kicking shovels into the ground all day. Only problem so far is that one of the plastic eyelets broke about 2 months in. If it happens again I may just replace them all with metal ones.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous1

customer_reviews.title: Dis colored
customer_reviews.text: The fit is fine. How ever not happy with the paint or stain coming off. There are several visual spot after 1 day of wearing in the field.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: A little big, but typical for work boots. Comfortable and exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great work boots. Survived construction for 2 years in all the weather elements and still going in great condition. Not cosmetically but functionally. Excellent slip resistance. Fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: R.E.F. Res

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable boot with structure but roomy enough for comfort
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic boot! My "go to" boot that I wear so much - - so this is my second pair! It's a roomier boot so I can wear thick socks, and the toe area isn't tight which is what I prefer - no pressure on the top or the sides which means no blisters!
customer_reviews.author: ScubaDe

customer_reviews.title: Best work boots I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: this is my second pair of these boots. I bought them again because I liked them so much.
customer_reviews.author: USChiMar

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: Great boot and durable. Would recommend. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: A&C

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these boots. I love all my wolverine boots. Cheaper then Danners, Ariats, Justin...and way more comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable right out of the box. Still needs a bit of breaking in but overall I'm very pleased. Measure your foot and go by their size chart.
customer_reviews.author: A. Paresa

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, I've always worn wolverine. I pound a lot of concrete in a day and my feet are always comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: but heel seems very hard and like something such as stitching or something is under your ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received so haven't worn them for long enough to know, but heel seems very hard and like something such as stitching or something is under your heel and uncomfortable. The top of the boot over the arch has tons of extra room, which I guess may be useful in bending up and down, when flexing foot, so not rubbing on top of foot. They seem to run kinda wide for me, but in length seems to run a big small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Light and comfortable! Even fashionable! Great for long work days.
customer_reviews.author: Em R

customer_reviews.title: Great for now, concerned about longevity.
customer_reviews.text: Love how light-weight they are, yet the toe feels strong and safe. The only thing I'm worried about is longevity. The toe area (top and sides) already seems to be sloughing off after just a few weeks of wear. Hope that's not a sign of them disintegrating.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Jackson

customer_reviews.title: I bought the shoes because of the composite toes, ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the shoes because of the composite toes, they seem to be a ;ittle warmer than steel toed shoes are.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Koch

customer_reviews.title: Pretty comfortable and they don't rub against your heal
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfortable and they don't rub against your heal. On the other hand they are very narrow and the laces continually come untied (they are to short to double knot).
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful boot! Fits true to size, very comfortable. I love the pink accents, it's just enough to have a feminine touch. I was able to wear them right away without needing to break them in. Like all steel toe/safety toe boots, the reinforced toe will rub through regular socks, so make sure to wear socks made for work boots.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Harkleroad

customer_reviews.title: Nice boot
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, well built boot. Good ankle and foot support. Perfect boot for the working girl.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I love the boots
customer_reviews.text: I love the boots, but the rubber on the toes started to peel immediately. Should’ve lasted at least a year, not 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying these boots for years and I love them
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not so comfy, the protective toe rubs and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Not so comfy, the protective toe rubs and the boot is a little big. I am a fan of wolverine boots but not impressed with this boot. The laces are very cute
customer_reviews.author: BF

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Extremely hard to get on and off because of the heel in the back, but once they are on its very nice and snug, good quality shoe overall, I can wear these is comfort for many hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I use these everyday as a union carpenter and they're great. They are also very cushioned and comfortable. Exactly what you want and need for work/hiking boots
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Gordon

customer_reviews.title: felt like flip flops on my feet after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Didn't hold up to the test of time. Had to buy a pair of timberland pros to replace. Had no support, felt like flip flops on my feet after 3 months. Rubber on the sides of sole coming off.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: thought they would be better fit because of name band but its big and ...
customer_reviews.text: thought they would be better fit because of name band but its big and the steel toe rubs on my left foot, i would not recomdon them to any one unless the try them on 1st.
customer_reviews.author: nancy melendez

customer_reviews.title: Wolverines look great but have issues
customer_reviews.text: This pair of Wolverine boots are made somewhat poorly. The inner material is not stitched well. They fit on the smaller side for me. They look great on but scuffed easily. I've only worn them once to a restaurant. Upon my return the top of one shoe was scuffed.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Nasr

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love them fits like a glove wear great never hurt at all
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Smith

customer_reviews.title: More for looks?
customer_reviews.text: The leather was ok , but the boots were stiff and uncomfortable the insole was cheap and thin basically I was just underwhelmed.
customer_reviews.author: pho jones

customer_reviews.title: Nice boot
customer_reviews.text: Nice. Light weight. Comfortable. If in colder temps and want thicker socks get wides.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Rand

customer_reviews.title: ... worried after reading other reviews but this boot fit perfect. I always get 1/2 size larger in boots ...
customer_reviews.text: Was worried after reading other reviews but this boot fit perfect. I always get 1/2 size larger in boots so that I can wear heavy socks.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Davis

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable even after weeks of wear. Too late to ...
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable even after weeks of wear. Too late to return. Crunched the top of my foot and noisy with hint of either going away. Why do they make you put one star?!
customer_reviews.author: Jamey Karnbach

customer_reviews.title: Great boots...
customer_reviews.text: These boots are well constructed and feel good even after a long day on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky888

customer_reviews.title: Very Satified
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I had purchased They are a great ladies work boot
customer_reviews.author: Judith B Hazeldon

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: I chose these boots for work because I have heel spurs. I love these boots. I am on my feet all day and I need something to keep my feet warm while offering support. The only thing I would change about these boots are: I wish the shank was more stiff, and I wish there were more support in the sole. Nothing that an insert can't fix!
customer_reviews.author: Raven2353

customer_reviews.title: Love them. Ordered my true size for boots
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Ordered my true size for boots. I wear a six in heels and 7 in running shoes. I got these in a 6.5 and they fit great! They have just a little bit of room for thick socks.
customer_reviews.author: Chuajr

customer_reviews.title: Great work boot
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable work boots. Fairly light weight. Love the pink accents.
customer_reviews.author: Tina N.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but my feet are narrow so I need to ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable but my feet are narrow so I need to put a heel or toe pad in shoe for better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: VERY stiff - will be good once broken in, I think. Ordered a half-size big, fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya W.

customer_reviews.title: Great work boots
customer_reviews.text: I wear a wide shoe and it's very difficult to find shoes/boots that fit. So looking for work boots that are electrical hazard rated for part of my PPE was tricky. Thanks, Wolverine, for making boots in wide sizes! Fits great, very sturdy but comfortable, and they were roomy enough for me to add a gel insole.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkle

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This shoes are soo comfortable, I walk 6 to 8 hours at work every day and they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice work boot ..just too wide even though the size is a medium
customer_reviews.author: c g

customer_reviews.title: wife loves them
customer_reviews.text: Upon buying these I was leary because I recently got a pair of Wolverines that hurt my wives feet and insoles fell apart, but getting these, She has had nothing but good luck. very comfortable and good quality for the price. It is very hard to find a good pair of womens boots. So far 7 months and kicking. Great boots
customer_reviews.author: Elmstreetslasher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great boot- fits well, great traction, excellent for warmth and dryness. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Christina S.

customer_reviews.title: Like the boots.
customer_reviews.text: good looking, fit well, are certainly waterproof (6 hours in the rain) and warm and will be buying a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: anne

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Boot fit a little snug...I found this boot to be extremely heavy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and light weight
customer_reviews.text: I had been struggling with finding affordable, comfortable work boots. I love these shoes and I couldn't be happier with the fit and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: SallySeven

customer_reviews.title: Boots not sized correctly
customer_reviews.text: The right boot was a size smaller. The left boot fit correctly . I'm currently wearing the same wolverines. I was just getting a new pair and the boots I'm wearing fit great !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Wolverine Women's Piper Comp-Toe Work Boot
product_meta.description: Established in Rockford, Michigan in 1883, Wolverine is an iconic American brand that combines superior materials with timeless craftsmanship. Wolverine boots are built to withstand the toughest of environments and provide all day comfort. Today, Wolverine leads the industry with a relentless commitment to innovation and patented technologies including Wolverine Contour Welt, Wolverine MultiShox, Wolverine Durashocks, Wolverine DuraShocks SR and Wolverine Fusion.
feature_bullets: Rated ASTM F2413-11 F I/75 C/75 EH
